alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan, southwestern Graham and northern Gove Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Grinnell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grainfield around 155 AM CDT. Park around 205 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 89 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
